import React from 'react'; import '../index.css'; import data from '../data'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import { Link, useParams, withRouter } from "react-router-dom"; export default function ProductScreen(props) { let {id}=useParams() const product = data.products.find((x) => x._id === id); if(!product) { return } else { console.log("first :", product.name) return (
Back to Result

  • {product.name}

  • Price : ${product.price}
  • Description

    {product.description}

  • Price
    ${product.price}
  • Status
    {product.countInStock> 0 ? ( In Stock ) : ( Out of Stock )}
) } }
